channel.title: Converting shops?
channel.description: Hey, I've been following this tut: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/478751-improved-dementhium-637-639-shop-creation.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/478751-improved-dementhium-637-639-shop-creation.html[/url] and it deleted all my shops, i have a back up but how can i convert them to this new format? (Got shit loads of shops don't feel like re-doing them)

item.title: Converting shops?
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

Hey, I’ve been following this tut: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/478751-improved-dementhium-637-639-shop-creation.html and it deleted all my shops, i have a back up but how can i convert them to this new format? (Got shit loads of shops don’t feel like re-doing them)

Read full topic
